mapper.select: select liveid, rock_time, rock_award_count, tugofwar_time, tugofwar_award_count, tugofwar_count, countmoney_time, countmoney_award_count, turntable_ content1, turntable_ content2, turntable_ content3, turntable_ content4, turntable_ content5, turntable_ content6, turntable_ content7, turntable_ content8 from tb_game_setting where liveid = #{liveid}
